summary: REQ-38 and REQ-40 appear implemented on the frontend via centralized nav config (including a Reviews link) and conditional header entry points based on admin existence/admin status. Admin allowlist management UI and React Query hooks were added/updated, but backend-side admin list endpoints/error handling (admin-only enforcement and last-admin removal prevention) are not evidenced in the provided backend diff snippet. Diff also introduces a migration file and mentions a new/repositioned Reviews section, which were not requested and may violate stated non-goals/constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend enforces admin-only access for viewing/modifying the admin list and returns clear English error messages for unauthorized access; backend prevents removing the last remaining admin with a clear English error message.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend hooks/components reference getAdminList/add/remove and mention backend enforcement, but the truncated backend diff provided does not show implementations of getAdminList/addAdmin/removeAdmin (or equivalent), nor any explicit checks/error messages for unauthorized access or preventing removal of the last admin.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend migration module (backend/migration.mo) with a no-op state transformation.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest allows adding backend/migration.mo only if a state upgrade is required; the diff summary provides no evidence of a required upgrade or any actual migration logic beyond returning empty state.

hallucinated_features.description: Landing page section order/content change implying a new Reviews section inserted between Pricing and FAQ.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal states not to change overall landing page section order beyond making the existing Reviews section discoverable via navigation. The diff summary text indicates the Reviews section is newly added/positioned between Pricing and FAQ, which goes beyond merely adding navigation discoverability.
